4487.verse: قُل|Say|45|56|765$لِّلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|131|750$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|105|84$يَغْفِرُواْ|(to) forgive|96|119|15635$لِلَّذِينَ|those who|89|112|750$لَا|(do) not|75|98|30$يَرْجُونَ|hope|92|104|1912$أَيَّامَ|(for the) days|113|120|15636$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah;|87|101|606$لِيَجْزِىَ|that He may recompense|186|200|8017$قَوْمَۢا|a people|76|90|7943$بِمَا|for what|76|90|43$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|124|94$يَكْسِبُونَ|earn.|97|97|759$

4488.verse: مَنْ|Whoever|78|88|76$عَمِلَ|does|66|85|10138$صَـٰلِحًا|a righteous deed,|136|155|622$فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ‌ۖ|then it is for his soul,|161|180|5915$وَمَنْ|and whoever|105|124|1012$أَسَآءَ|does evil,|83|93|15322$فَعَلَيْهَا‌ۖ|then it (is) against it.|163|184|5917$ثُمَّ|Then|53|95|293$إِلَىٰ|to|53|95|118$رَبِّكُمْ|your Lord|82|124|490$تُرْجَعُونَ|you will be returned.|156|177|297$

4489.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|132|640$ءَاتَيْنَا|We gave|78|117|509$بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|(the) Children of Israel|170|209|10567$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book|85|124|451$وَٱلْحُكْمَ|and the wisdom|124|144|3039$وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ|and the Prophethood,|164|200|3040$وَرَزَقْنَـٰهُم|and We provided them|169|242|8315$مِّنَ|of|50|123|156$ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ|the good things|124|160|6915$وَفَضَّلْنَـٰهُمْ|and We preferred them|173|258|10464$عَلَى|over|63|233|52$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|the worlds.|99|184|8$

4490.verse: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم|And We gave them|146|154|4079$بَيِّنَـٰتٍ|clear proofs|98|114|931$مِّنَ|of|50|66|156$ٱلْأَمْرِ‌ۖ|the matter.|96|112|3263$فَمَا|And not|72|88|132$ٱخْتَلَفُوٓاْ|they differed|105|120|1512$إِلَّا|except|65|73|86$مِنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|98|280$مَا|[what]|65|78|262$جَآءَهُمُ|came to them|112|125|2702$ٱلْعِلْمُ|the knowledge,|121|134|2703$بَغْيَۢا|(out of) envy|109|122|1862$بَيْنَهُمْ‌ۚ|between themselves.|161|168|1056$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|81|58$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|104|586$يَقْضِى|will judge|82|104|8316$بَيْنَهُمْ|between them|115|137|1056$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|127|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection|159|170|820$فِيمَا|about what|96|146|1058$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|216|94$فِيهِ|therein|66|165|32$يَخْتَلِفُونَ|differ.|99|148|1059$

4492.verse: إِنَّهُمْ|Indeed, they|105|112|106$لَن|never|57|71|524$يُغْنُواْ|will avail|75|89|15639$عَنكَ|you|64|78|1109$مِنَ|against|68|82|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|67|606$شَيْــًٔا‌ۚ|(in) anything.|110|124|472$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|105|713$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers|123|132|377$بَعْضُهُمْ|some of them|110|128|736$أَوْلِيَآءُ|(are) allies|90|108|5037$بَعْضٍ‌ۖ|(of) others,|97|115|1316$وَٱللَّهُ|and Allah|80|98|167$وَلِىُّ|(is the) Protector|136|145|2294$ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ|(of) the righteous.|143|143|1567$

4493.verse: هَـٰذَا|This|59|72|248$بَصَـٰٓئِرُ|(is) enlightenment|140|166|5913$لِلنَّاسِ|for mankind|96|122|787$وَهُدًى|and guidance|108|134|921$وَرَحْمَةٌ|and mercy|92|118|1376$لِّقَوْمٍ|for a people|99|112|1100$يُوقِنُونَ|who are certain.|129|129|50$

4494.verse: أَمْ|Do|38|49|62$حَسِبَ|think|77|98|13563$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|110|20$ٱجْتَرَحُواْ|commit|106|127|15640$ٱلسَّيِّـَٔـاتِ|evil deeds|96|117|3823$أَن|that|48|69|655$نَّجْعَلَهُمْ|We will make them|143|154|15641$كَٱلَّذِينَ|like those|83|98|3147$ءَامَنُواْ|who believed|106|135|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and did|92|121|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds|125|154|239$سَوَآءً|equal|71|100|3179$مَّحْيَاهُمْ|(in) their life|102|117|15642$وَمَمَاتُهُمْ‌ۚ|and their death?|129|185|15643$سَآءَ|Evil is|57|168|5131$مَا|what|53|164|262$يَحْكُمُونَ|they judge.|102|158|6074$

4495.verse: وَخَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ|And Allah created|137|145|15644$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|130|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|126|2280$بِٱلْحَقِّ|in truth|78|94|692$وَلِتُجْزَىٰ|and that may be recompensed|222|230|15645$كُلُّ|every|57|70|575$نَفْسِۭ|soul|62|89|2507$بِمَا|for what|76|103|43$كَسَبَتْ|it has earned,|112|139|1265$وَهُمْ|and they|79|106|256$لَا يُظْلَمُونَ|will not be wronged.|154|168|2508$

4487.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], to those who have believed that they [should] forgive those who expect not the days of Allah so that He may recompense a people for what they used to earn.

4488.verse: Whoever does a good deed - it is for himself; and whoever does evil - it is against the self. Then to your Lord you will be returned.

4489.verse: And We did certainly give the Children of Israel the Scripture and judgement and prophethood, and We provided them with good things and preferred them over the worlds.

4490.verse: And We gave them clear proofs of the matter [of religion]. And they did not differ except after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.

4491.verse: Then We put you, [O Muhammad], on an ordained way concerning the matter [of religion]; so follow it and do not follow the inclinations of those who do not know.

4492.verse: Indeed, they will never avail you against Allah at all. And indeed, the wrongdoers are allies of one another; but Allah is the protector of the righteous.

4493.verse: This [Qur'an] is enlightenment for mankind and guidance and mercy for a people who are certain [in faith].

4494.verse: Or do those who commit evils think We will make them like those who have believed and done righteous deeds - [make them] equal in their life and their death? Evil is that which they judge.

4495.verse: And Allah created the heavens and earth in truth and so that every soul may be recompensed for what it has earned, and they will not be wronged.
